name: Benten-cho
description: Benten-cho is the home turf of the Noise Tanks, a rival tech-savvy gang of the GG's.

name: Kogane-cho
description: Kogane-cho is the home turf of Poison Jam, spray painting their terrorizing graffiti.

name: Shibuya-cho
description: A city in the south of Tokyo-to, described as 'the city of daylight'. It is home turf to the GGs & the Love Shockers.

name: Grind City
description: Grind City is the turf that used to belong to Combo, Cube, and Coin before the Golden Rhinos started to invade.
